content: विराज् {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To shine, glitter; <ls>Bv. 1. 88.</ls> {@--2@} To appear or look like; <ls>R. 2. 20.</ls> {@--3@} To be eminent or illustrious. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To brighten, illuminate, irradiate.

विराज् {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} Beauty, splendour. {@--2@} A man of the Kṣatriya or warrior tribe. {@--3@} The first progeny of Brahman; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Ms. 1. 32</ls>; तस्मात् विराडजायत <ls>Rv. 10. 90. 5</ls> (where विराज् is represented as born from {%Puruṣa%}). {@--4@} The body. {@--5@} (In Vedānta <ab>phil.</ab>) <ab>N.</ab> of ‘intellect’ considered as ruling over the aggregate of bodies. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} <ab>N.</ab> of a Vedic metre.
